pylapp.smoothclicker.android.receivers

Class BRClicker

  • java.lang.Object
    • BroadcastReceiver
      • pylapp.smoothclicker.android.receivers.BRClicker
  • Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public class BRClicker
extends BroadcastReceiver
    Broadcast receiver which receives broadcasts about the battery state and the boot state so as to start or stop the service making clicks..
    Since:
    18/03/2016
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    pylapp
    See Also:
    android.content.BroadcastReceiver
